projects.title: HeartWave
projects.description: Built a real-time heart rate monitoring app using Qt and SQL, outlining use cases with UML and sequence diagrams and applying an observer pattern to visualize and store detailed HRV data

projects.title: OrderUp
projects.description: Engineered a full-stack food ordering web app using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB and by implementing a secure and scalable REST API, supporting user logins, menu displays, and order requests

projects.title: EasyCart
projects.description: Designed and developed a desktop shopping cart app using Figma, Java, and JavaFX, leveraging object-oriented patterns and event-driven programming for dynamic menus, calculations, and real-time updates
